title: FS: SGC 3.5  Brown Wash, SGC 3 Kleinow BOS
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS: SGC 3.5  Brown Wash, SGC 3 Kleinow BOS
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
Trying to put together some more cash to work on the HOFers.
PayPal, Zelle, Cash are all good with me.

Kleinow is really pretty just a couple glue remnants on back, really pretty for the grade and being Polar Bear backed.

Kleinow BOS Polar Bear SGC 3 - $350
Brown WASH SC350-30 SGC 3.5 - $335
Mullin Piedmont Factory 42 PSA2.5 - $$$$OLD !!!

Thanks,
Bob
PM or email to: [url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
Mullin was priced to move. Needed it for a mini run. Congrats to buyer.

I’m trying to put together some REA $ so trying to price things, just enough to break me even!
Yep, I got a deal and passed it along to a happy buyer! I’ll keep my eyes peeled for another Mullin for you,
Thanks,
Bob
Thanks! That's kind of you. Good luck in REA!
